trans-unit.source: Default: Usually false. If UCA_Version is 22 or 24, and the value of long_contraction is not specified in new() , a true value is set implicitly. This is a workaround to pass Conformance Tests for Unicode 6.0.0 and 6.1.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：通常为false。如果 UCA_Version 为22或24，并且未在 new() 中指定 long_contraction 的值，则将隐式设置一个真值。这是通过Unicode 6.0.0和6.1.0一致性测试的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: Default: Usually false. If UCA_Version is 22 or 24, and the value of long_contraction is not specified in new(), a true value is set implicitly. This is a workaround to pass Conformance Tests for Unicode 6.0.0 and 6.1.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值：通常为false。如果 UCA_Version 为22或24，并且未在 new() 中指定 long_contraction 的值，则将隐式设置一个真值。这是通过Unicode 6.0.0和6.1.0一致性测试的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: Definitions for locales that you use must be installed. You, or your system administrator, must make sure that this is the case. The available locales, the location in which they are kept, and the manner in which they are installed all vary from system to system. Some systems provide only a few, hard-wired locales and do not allow more to be added. Others allow you to add "canned" locales provided by the system supplier. Still others allow you or the system administrator to define and add arbitrary locales. (You may have to ask your supplier to provide canned locales that are not delivered with your operating system.) Read your system documentation for further illumination.
trans-unit.target: 必须安装您使用的语言环境的定义。您或您的系统管理员必须确保是这种情况。可用的语言环境，保留它们的位置以及安装它们的方式在系统之间各不相同。某些系统仅提供少数几种硬连接的语言环境，不允许添加更多语言环境。其他允许您添加系统供应商提供的“罐头”区域设置。还有一些允许您或系统管理员定义和添加任意语言环境。（您可能必须要求供应商提供操作系统未提供的固定语言环境。）阅读系统文档以获取进一步的信息。

trans-unit.source: Delimiter for here document is too long
Deprecated and ignored. Obey the current setting of $/, like IO::Handle does? Default is false in 1.x, but cold-welded true in 2.x and later.
trans-unit.target: 弃用并忽略。遵守$ /的当前设置，就像IO :: Handle一样吗？在1.x中，默认值为false，但在2.x及更高版本中，冷焊为true。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this pragma for anything else than telling Perl that your script is written in UTF-8. The utility functions described below are directly usable without use utf8; .
trans-unit.target: 除了告诉Perl脚本是用UTF-8编写外，请勿将此实用程序用于任何其他用途。下述实用程序功能可以直接使用，而无需 use utf8; 。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this pragma for anything else than telling Perl that your script is written in UTF-8. The utility functions described below are directly usable without use utf8;.
trans-unit.target: 除了告诉Perl脚本是用UTF-8编写之外，请勿将此实用程序用于任何其他用途。下述实用程序功能可以直接使用，而无需 use utf8; 。

trans-unit.source: Do you have a proper test case?

Domain - Domain to use, i.e. AF_INET or AF_INET6. This argument will be passed to the IO::Socket super class. This can be used to enforce IPv4 even with IO::Socket::IP which would default to IPv6. Family is accepted as alternative name for Domain.
trans-unit.target: 域-要使用的域，即AF_INET或AF_INET6。此参数将传递给IO :: Socket超类。即使使用默认为IPv6的IO :: Socket :: IP，这也可用于强制实施IPv4 。Family被接受为Domain的替代名称。

trans-unit.source: Domain - This parameter is passed directly to IO::Socket and makes it possible to enforce IPv4 connections even if IO::Socket::IP is used as super class. Alternatively Family can be used.
trans-unit.target: 域-此参数直接传递给IO :: Socket，即使将IO :: Socket :: IP用作超类，也可以强制执行IPv4连接。或者，可以使用家庭。

trans-unit.source: Don't know how to get file name
Don't know how to handle magic of type \%o
trans-unit.target: 不知道如何处理\％o类型的魔术

trans-unit.source: Don't attempt to store references to data structures as integers which are retrieved via caller and converted back, as this will not be threadsafe. Accesses would be to the structure without locking (which is not safe for Perl's scalars), and either the structure has to leak, or it has to be freed when its creating thread terminates, which may be before the optree referencing it is deleted, if other threads outlive it.
trans-unit.target: 请勿尝试将对数据结构的引用存储为通过 caller 检索并转换回的整数，因为这将不是线程安全的。访问将是不锁定的结构（这对于Perl的标量而言是不安全的），并且该结构必须泄漏，或者必须在其创建线程终止时将其释放（如果在删除引用它的optree之前，如果存在的话）其他线程的寿命更长。

trans-unit.source: Don't attempt to store references to data structures as integers which are retrieved via caller and converted back, as this will not be threadsafe. Accesses would be to the structure without locking (which is not safe for Perl's scalars), and either the structure has to leak, or it has to be freed when its creating thread terminates, which may be before the optree referencing it is deleted, if other threads outlive it.
trans-unit.target: 请勿尝试将对数据结构的引用存储为通过 caller 检索并转换回的整数，因为这将不是线程安全的。访问将是对结构的无锁定（这对于Perl的标量而言是不安全的），或者结构必须泄漏，或者在其创建线程终止时必须释放结构（如果在引用它的optree被删除之前，如果这样的话）其他线程的寿命超过了它。

trans-unit.target: GNU as和GNU ld的动态加载问题

trans-unit.source: Encode::Encoder allows you to use Encode in an object-oriented style. This is not only more intuitive than a functional approach, but also handier when you want to stack encodings. Suppose you want your UTF-8 string converted to Latin1 then Base64: you can simply say

trans-unit.source: Eval-group not allowed, use re 'eval' in regex m/%s/

trans-unit.source: ExactAddresses - If true the all ADDRESS arguments must be as defined by addr-spec in RFC2822. If not given, or false, then Net::SMTP will attempt to extract the address from the value passed.
trans-unit.target: ExactAddresses-如果为true，则所有ADDRESS参数都必须由RFC2822中的 addr-spec 定义。如果未给出或为false，则Net :: SMTP将尝试从传递的值中提取地址。

trans-unit.source: Fatal has been obsoleted by the new autodie pragma. Please use autodie in preference to Fatal . autodie supports lexical scoping, throws real exception objects, and provides much nicer error messages.
trans-unit.target: 新的autodie实用程序已使致命程序过时了。请使用autodie优先于 Fatal 。autodie支持词法作用域，抛出真实的异常对象，并提供更好的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Fatal has been obsoleted by the new autodie pragma. Please use autodie in preference to Fatal. autodie supports lexical scoping, throws real exception objects, and provides much nicer error messages.
trans-unit.target: 致命问题已被新的autodie实用程序淘汰。请使用autodie优先于 Fatal 。autodie支持词法作用域，抛出真实的异常对象，并提供更好的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Filehandle STDIN reopened as %s only for output
trans-unit.target: 重新将文件句柄STDIN作为％s重新打开仅用于输出

trans-unit.source: Firewall - The name of a machine which acts as an FTP firewall. This can be overridden by an environment variable FTP_FIREWALL . If specified, and the given host cannot be directly connected to, then the connection is made to the firewall machine and the string @hostname is appended to the login identifier. This kind of setup is also referred to as an ftp proxy.
trans-unit.target: 防火墙 -充当FTP防火墙的计算机的名称。这可以由环境变量 FTP_FIREWALL 覆盖。如果指定了该名称，并且给定的主机无法直接连接到该主机，则将与防火墙计算机建立连接，并将字符串 @hostname 附加到登录标识符之后。这种设置也称为ftp代理。

trans-unit.source: Firewall - The name of a machine which acts as an FTP firewall. This can be overridden by an environment variable FTP_FIREWALL. If specified, and the given host cannot be directly connected to, then the connection is made to the firewall machine and the string @hostname is appended to the login identifier. This kind of setup is also referred to as an ftp proxy.
trans-unit.target: 防火墙-充当FTP防火墙的计算机的名称。这可以由环境变量 FTP_FIREWALL 覆盖。如果指定了该名称，并且给定的主机无法直接连接到该主机，则将与防火墙计算机建立连接，并将字符串 @hostname 附加到登录标识符之后。这种设置也称为ftp代理。

trans-unit.source: FirewallType - The type of firewall running on the machine indicated by Firewall. This can be overridden by an environment variable FTP_FIREWALL_TYPE . For a list of permissible types, see the description of ftp_firewall_type in Net::Config.
trans-unit.target: FirewallType-由Firewall指示的在计算机上运行的防火墙的类型。可以由环境变量 FTP_FIREWALL_TYPE 覆盖。有关允许的类型的列表，请参见Net :: Config中的ftp_firewall_type的描述。

trans-unit.source: FirewallType - The type of firewall running on the machine indicated by Firewall. This can be overridden by an environment variable FTP_FIREWALL_TYPE. For a list of permissible types, see the description of ftp_firewall_type in Net::Config.
trans-unit.target: FirewallType-由Firewall指示的在计算机上运行的防火墙的类型。可以使用环境变量 FTP_FIREWALL_TYPE 覆盖它。有关允许的类型的列表，请参见Net :: Config中的ftp_firewall_type的描述。
对于构建/链接时的动态扩展

trans-unit.source: GDBM_File is a module which allows Perl programs to make use of the facilities provided by the GNU gdbm library. If you intend to use this module you should really have a copy of the gdbm manualpage at hand.
trans-unit.target: GDBM_File是一个模块，允许Perl程序使用GNU gdbm库提供的功能。如果您打算使用此模块，那么您实际上应该手头上有一份gdbm手册的副本。

Get the order right! It doesn't work the other way around!
trans-unit.target: 得到正确的订单！反之则行不通！

trans-unit.source: GetOpt::Long Options can now take multiple values at once (experimental)
trans-unit.target: GetOpt :: Long选项现在可以一次获取多个值（实验性）

trans-unit.source: Given -n, if there's a opt_n_with, it'll call $object->opt_n_with( ARGUMENT ) (e.g., "-n foo" => $object->opt_n_with('foo'). Ditto "-nfoo")
trans-unit.target: 给定-n，如果有opt_n_with，它将调用$ object-> opt_n_with（ARGUMENT）（例如，“-n foo” => $ object-> opt_n_with（'foo'）。同上“ -nfoo”）

trans-unit.source: Global symbol "%s" requires explicit package name (did you forget to declare "my %s"?)
trans-unit.target: 全局符号“％s”需要显式的程序包名称（您是否忘了声明“ my％s”？）

trans-unit.source: Group name must start with a non-digit word character in regex; marked by <-- HERE in m/%s/
trans-unit.target: 组名必须以正则表达式中的非数字字字符开头；以<-HERE标记，以m /％s /

trans-unit.source: Hash - If given a reference to a file handle (e.g., \*STDERR ), print hash marks (#) on that filehandle every 1024 bytes. This simply invokes the hash() method for you, so that hash marks are displayed for all transfers. You can, of course, call hash() explicitly whenever you'd like.
trans-unit.target: 哈希 -如果指定了对文件句柄的引用（例如 \*STDERR ），则每1024字节在该文件句柄上打印哈希标记（＃）。这只是为您调用 hash() 方法，以便为所有传输显示哈希标记。当然，您可以随时根据需要显式调用 hash() 。

trans-unit.source: Hash - If given a reference to a file handle (e.g., \*STDERR), print hash marks (#) on that filehandle every 1024 bytes. This simply invokes the hash() method for you, so that hash marks are displayed for all transfers. You can, of course, call hash() explicitly whenever you'd like.
trans-unit.target: 哈希-如果指定了对文件句柄的引用（例如 \*STDERR ），则每1024字节在该文件句柄上打印哈希标记（＃）。这只是为您调用 hash() 方法，以便为所有传输显示哈希标记。当然，您可以随时根据需要显式调用 hash() 。

trans-unit.source: Having more than one /%c regexp modifier is deprecated
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用多个/％c regexp修饰符

trans-unit.source: Hello - SMTP requires that you identify yourself. This option specifies a string to pass as your mail domain. If not given localhost.localdomain will be used.
trans-unit.target: 您好 -SMTP要求您标识自己。此选项指定要作为您的邮件域传递的字符串。如果未给出，将使用localhost.localdomain。
十六进制浮点数：不支持的长双精度格式

trans-unit.source: Hint: If both server and client machines use the same line ending for text files, then it will be faster to transfer all files in binary mode.
trans-unit.target: 提示：如果服务器和客户端计算机都使用同一行结尾的文本文件，则以二进制模式传输所有文件将更快。

trans-unit.source: Host - FTP host to connect to. It may be a single scalar, as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The host method will return the value which was used to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 主机 -要连接的FTP主机。它可以是为IO :: Socket :: INET中的 PeerAddr 选项定义的单个标量，也可以是对包含主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。该主机的方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。

trans-unit.source: Host - FTP host to connect to. It may be a single scalar, as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The "host" method will return the value which was used to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 主机-要连接的FTP主机。它可以是为IO :: Socket :: INET中的 PeerAddr 选项定义的单个标量，也可以是对包含主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。在“主机”方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。

trans-unit.source: Host - NNTP host to connect to. It may be a single scalar, as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The host method will return the value which was used to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 主机 -要连接的NNTP主机。它可以是单个标量，如在IO :: Socket :: INET中为 PeerAddr 选项定义的那样，或者是对具有主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。该主机的方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。

trans-unit.source: Host - NNTP host to connect to. It may be a single scalar, as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The "host" method will return the value which was used to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 主机-要连接的NNTP主机。它可以是为IO :: Socket :: INET中的 PeerAddr 选项定义的单个标量，也可以是对包含主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。在“主机”方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。

trans-unit.source: Host - POP3 host to connect to. It may be a single scalar, as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The host method will return the value which was used to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 主机 -要连接的POP3主机。它可以是单个标量，如在IO :: Socket :: INET中为 PeerAddr 选项定义的那样，或者是对具有主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。该主机的方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。

trans-unit.source: Host - POP3 host to connect to. It may be a single scalar, as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The "host" method will return the value which was used to connect to the host.
trans-unit.target: 主机-要连接的POP3主机。它可以是为IO :: Socket :: INET中的 PeerAddr 选项定义的单个标量，也可以是对包含主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。在“主机”方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。

trans-unit.source: Host - SMTP host to connect to. It may be a single scalar (hostname[:port]), as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The host method will return the value which was used to connect to the host. Format - PeerHost from IO::Socket::INET new method.
trans-unit.target: 主机 -要连接的SMTP主机。它可以是单个标量（主机名[：端口]），如IO :: Socket :: INET中的 PeerAddr 选项所定义，或者是对具有主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。该主机的方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。格式- 来自IO :: Socket :: INET新方法的 PeerHost 。

trans-unit.source: Host - SMTP host to connect to. It may be a single scalar (hostname[:port]), as defined for the PeerAddr option in IO::Socket::INET, or a reference to an array with hosts to try in turn. The "host" method will return the value which was used to connect to the host. Format - PeerHost from IO::Socket::INET new method.
trans-unit.target: 主机-要连接的SMTP主机。它可以是IO :: Socket :: INET中为 PeerAddr 选项定义的单个标量（主机名[：端口]），或者是对包含主机的数组的引用，依次尝试。在“主机”方法将返回这是用来连接到主机的价值。格式-来自IO :: Socket :: INET新方法的 PeerHost 。

trans-unit.source: IMPORTANT: Without patch 2401, a kernel bug in Irix 6.2 will cause your machine to panic and crash when running threaded perl. Irix 6.3 and later are okay.
trans-unit.target: 重要说明：如果没有补丁2401，则在运行线程Perl时Irix 6.2中的内核错误将导致您的计算机崩溃并崩溃。Irix 6.3及更高版本都可以。

trans-unit.target: IO :: Zlib :: import：没有Compress :: Zlib并且没有外部gzip

trans-unit.source: If a circular reference is found, fall back to referential equality.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了循环引用，则退回到引用相等。

trans-unit.source: If it's something the programmer hasn't done yet, use TODO. This is for any code you haven't written yet, or bugs you have yet to fix, but want to put tests in your testing script (always a good idea).
trans-unit.target: 如果这是程序员尚未完成的工作，请使用TODO。这适用于您尚未编写的任何代码，或者尚未修复的错误，但是想要将测试放入测试脚本中（总是一个好主意）。

trans-unit.source: If it's something the user might not be able to do, use SKIP. This includes optional modules that aren't installed, running under an OS that doesn't have some feature (like fork() or symlinks), or maybe you need an Internet connection and one isn't available.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是用户可能无法执行的操作，请使用SKIP。这包括未安装的可选模块，这些模块在没有某些功能（例如 fork() 或符号链接）的操作系统下运行，或者您可能需要Internet连接并且不可用。

trans-unit.source: If it's something the user might not be able to do, use SKIP. This includes optional modules that aren't installed, running under an OS that doesn't have some feature (like fork() or symlinks), or maybe you need an Internet connection and one isn't available.

trans-unit.source: Implementation Note: (1) For expansion mapping (Unicode character mapped to a sequence of collation elements), a terminator will not be added between collation elements, even if Hangul syllable boundary exists there. Addition of terminator is restricted to the next position to the last collation element.
trans-unit.target: 实施注意事项：（1）对于扩展映射（将Unicode字符映射到排序元素的序列），即使在其中存在韩文音节边界的情况下，也不会在排序元素之间添加终止符。终止符的添加仅限于最后一个排序规则元素的下一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Limitation: Scanning non-starters is one-way (no back tracking). If AB is found but not ABC is not found, other long contraction where the first character is A and the second is not B may not be found.
trans-unit.target: 局限性：扫描非启动器是单向的（无回溯）。如果找到了AB，但没有找到ABC，则可能找不到第一个字符是A而第二个字符不是B的其他长收缩。

trans-unit.source: LocalAddr - If multiple IP addresses are present on the client host with a valid route to the destination, you can specify the address your Net::NNTP connects from and this way override the operating system's pick.
trans-unit.target: LocalAddr-如果客户端主机上存在多个IP地址，并且具有到目标地址的有效路由，则可以指定 Net::NNTP 连接的地址，这样可以覆盖操作系统的要求。

trans-unit.source: LocalAddr - Local address to use for all socket connections, this argument will be passed to IO::Socket::INET
trans-unit.target: LocalAddr-用于所有套接字连接的本地地址，此参数将传递给IO :: Socket :: INET

trans-unit.source: LocalAddr - Local address to use for all socket connections. This argument will be passed to the super class, i.e. IO::Socket::INET or IO::Socket::IP.
trans-unit.target: LocalAddr-用于所有套接字连接的本地地址。该参数将传递给超类，即IO :: Socket :: INET或IO :: Socket :: IP。

trans-unit.source: LocalAddr and LocalPort - These parameters are passed directly to IO::Socket to allow binding the socket to a local port.
trans-unit.target: LocalAddr和LocalPort-这些参数直接传递到IO :: Socket以允许将套接字绑定到本地端口。

trans-unit.source: LocalAddr and LocalPort - These parameters are passed directly to IO::Socket to allow binding the socket to a specific local address and port.
trans-unit.target: LocalAddr和LocalPort-这些参数直接传递到IO :: Socket，以允许将套接字绑定到特定的本地地址和端口。

trans-unit.source: LocalAddr and LocalPort - These parameters are passed directly to IO::Socket to allow binding the socket to a specific local address and port. For compatibility with older versions ResvPort can be used instead of LocalPort.
trans-unit.target: LocalAddr和LocalPort-这些参数直接传递到IO :: Socket，以允许将套接字绑定到特定的本地地址和端口。为了与旧版本兼容，可以使用ResvPort代替LocalPort。

trans-unit.source: Much of this document has become very out of date and needs updating, rewriting or deleting. The build process was overhauled during the 5.19 development track and the current instructions as of that time are given in CURRENT BUILD INSTRUCTIONS; the previous build instructions, which are largely superseded but may still contain some useful information, are left in OLD BUILD INSTRUCTIONS but really need removing after anything of use has been extracted from them.
trans-unit.target: 本文档中的许多内容已经过时，需要更新，重写或删除。在5.19开发轨道上对编译过程进行了全面的修订，当时的当前指示在当前的内置指令中给出; 以前的构建说明已在很大程度上被取代，但仍可能包含一些有用的信息，它们保留在旧的构建说明中，但是在从中提取出任何用途后，确实需要删除它们。

trans-unit.source: NO-BREAK SPACE in a charnames alias definition is deprecated
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用charnames别名定义中的NO-BREAK SPACE

trans-unit.source: NOTE 1: Running under older memory debuggers such as Purify, valgrind or Third Degree greatly slows down the execution: seconds become minutes, minutes become hours. For example as of Perl 5.8.1, the ext/Encode/t/Unicode.t takes extraordinarily long to complete under e.g. Purify, Third Degree, and valgrind. Under valgrind it takes more than six hours, even on a snappy computer. The said test must be doing something that is quite unfriendly for memory debuggers. If you don't feel like waiting, that you can simply kill away the perl process. Roughly valgrind slows down execution by factor 10, AddressSanitizer by factor 2.
trans-unit.target: 注意1：在较早的内存调试器（例如Purify，valgrind或Third Degree）下运行会大大减慢执行速度：秒变为分钟，分钟变为小时。例如，从Perl 5.8.1开始，ext / Encode / t / Unicode.t在例如Purify，Third Degree和valgrind下花费的时间特别长。在valgrind下，即使在一台灵巧的计算机上也要花费六个多小时。所说的测试必须做的事情对于内存调试器来说是非常不友好的。如果您不想等待，可以简单地取消perl进程。大约valgrind将执行速度降低10倍，将AddressSanitizer降低2倍。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 1: This higher resolution timer can return values either less or more than the core time(), depending on whether your platform rounds the higher resolution timer values up, down, or to the nearest second to get the core time(), but naturally the difference should be never more than half a second. See also clock_getres, if available in your system.
trans-unit.target: 注意1：此高分辨率计时器可以返回小于或大于core time() 的值，具体取决于您的平台是将高分辨率计时器的值向上，向下还是四舍五入以获取core time() ，但是自然，差异不应超过半秒。另请参见clock_getres（如果系统中可用）。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 1: This higher resolution timer can return values either less or more than the core time(), depending on whether your platform rounds the higher resolution timer values up, down, or to the nearest second to get the core time(), but naturally the difference should be never more than half a second. See also "clock_getres", if available in your system.
trans-unit.target: 注意1：此高分辨率计时器可以返回小于或大于core time() 的值，具体取决于您的平台将高分辨率计时器的值向上，向下还是四舍五入以获取core time() ，但是自然，差异不应超过半秒。另请参阅“ clock_getres”（如果系统中可用）。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 1: With some combinations of operating systems and Perl releases SIGALRM restarts select(), instead of interrupting it. This means that an alarm() followed by a select() may together take the sum of the times specified for the alarm() and the select(), not just the time of the alarm().
trans-unit.target: 注意1：使用操作系统和Perl版本的某些组合， SIGALRM 会重新启动 select() ，而不是中断它。这意味着，一个 alarm() 后跟一个 select() 可以一起对指定的时间的总和 alarm() 和 select() ，而不仅仅是的时间 alarm() 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 1: With some combinations of operating systems and Perl releases SIGALRM restarts select(), instead of interrupting it. This means that an alarm() followed by a select() may together take the sum of the times specified for the alarm() and the select(), not just the time of the alarm().
trans-unit.target: 注意1：使用操作系统和Perl版本的某些组合， SIGALRM 会重新启动 select() ，而不是中断它。这意味着，一个 alarm() 后跟一个 select() 可以一起对指定的时间的总和 alarm() 和 select() ，而不仅仅是的时间 alarm() 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 2: Since Sunday, September 9th, 2001 at 01:46:40 AM GMT, when the time() seconds since epoch rolled over to 1_000_000_000, the default floating point format of Perl and the seconds since epoch have conspired to produce an apparent bug: if you print the value of Time::HiRes::time() you seem to be getting only five decimals, not six as promised (microseconds). Not to worry, the microseconds are there (assuming your platform supports such granularity in the first place). What is going on is that the default floating point format of Perl only outputs 15 digits. In this case that means ten digits before the decimal separator and five after. To see the microseconds you can use either printf/sprintf with "%.6f" , or the gettimeofday() function in list context, which will give you the seconds and microseconds as two separate values.
trans-unit.target: 注2：自格林威治标准时间2001年9月9日（星期日）上午01:46:40开始，当从 time() 秒翻转到1_000_000_000时，Perl的默认浮点格式和从时间段开始的秒数合谋产生了一个明显的错误：如果您打印 Time::HiRes::time() 的值，您似乎只会得到五个小数，而不是承诺的六个（微秒）。不用担心，那里只有微秒级（假设您的平台首先支持这种粒度）。这说明Perl的默认浮点格式仅输出15位数字。在这种情况下，这意味着十进制分隔符前十位，后十位。要查看微秒，您可以将 printf / sprintf 与 "%.6f" 或列表上下文中的 gettimeofday() 函数，它将为您提供秒和微秒两个独立的值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 2: Since Sunday, September 9th, 2001 at 01:46:40 AM GMT, when the time() seconds since epoch rolled over to 1_000_000_000, the default floating point format of Perl and the seconds since epoch have conspired to produce an apparent bug: if you print the value of Time::HiRes::time() you seem to be getting only five decimals, not six as promised (microseconds). Not to worry, the microseconds are there (assuming your platform supports such granularity in the first place). What is going on is that the default floating point format of Perl only outputs 15 digits. In this case that means ten digits before the decimal separator and five after. To see the microseconds you can use either printf/sprintf with "%.6f", or the gettimeofday() function in list context, which will give you the seconds and microseconds as two separate values.
trans-unit.target: 注2：自格林威治标准时间2001年9月9日（星期日）上午01:46:40以来，从纪元开始的 time() 秒翻转到1_000_000_000，Perl的默认浮点格式和自纪元以来的秒数合谋产生了一个明显的错误：如果您打印 Time::HiRes::time() 的值，您似乎只会得到五个小数，而不是承诺的六个（微秒）。不用担心，那里只有微秒级（假设您的平台首先支持这种粒度）。这说明Perl的默认浮点格式仅输出15位数字。在这种情况下，这意味着十进制分隔符前十位，后五位。要查看微秒，您可以将 printf / sprintf 与 "%.6f" 或列表上下文中的 gettimeofday() 函数，它将为您提供秒和微秒两个独立的值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 2: To minimize the number of memory leak false alarms (see "PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL" for more information), you have to set the environment variable PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL to 2. For example, like this:
trans-unit.target: 注意2：为了最大程度地减少内存泄漏错误警报（有关更多信息，请参见“ PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL”），必须将环境变量PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL设置为2。例如，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: NOTE 2: To minimize the number of memory leak false alarms (see PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL for more information), you have to set the environment variable PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL to 2. For example, like this:
trans-unit.target: 注意2：为了最大程度地减少内存泄漏错误警报（有关更多信息，请参见PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL），必须将环境变量PERL_DESTRUCT_LEVEL设置为2。例如，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: NOTE 3: There are known memory leaks when there are compile-time errors within eval or require, seeing S_doeval in the call stack is a good sign of these. Fixing these leaks is non-trivial, unfortunately, but they must be fixed eventually.
trans-unit.target: 注3：当eval内或要求中存在编译时错误时，就会发生已知的内存泄漏，在调用堆栈中看到 S_doeval 是一个很好的信号。不幸的是，修复这些泄漏并非易事，但最终必须修复它们。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 4: DynaLoader will not clean up after itself completely unless Perl is built with the Configure option -Accflags=-DDL_UNLOAD_ALL_AT_EXIT .
trans-unit.target: 注4：动态加载之后不会完全自己收拾，除非Perl是与配置选项内置 -Accflags=-DDL_UNLOAD_ALL_AT_EXIT 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE 4: DynaLoader will not clean up after itself completely unless Perl is built with the Configure option -Accflags=-DDL_UNLOAD_ALL_AT_EXIT.
trans-unit.target: 注4：动态加载之后不会完全自己收拾，除非Perl是与配置选项内置 -Accflags=-DDL_UNLOAD_ALL_AT_EXIT 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE. Neglecting to set this flag in
NOTE: This module is considered legacy; modern Perl releases (5.18 and higher) are going to remove Pod-Parser from core and use Pod-Simple for all things POD.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此模块被认为是旧模块；最新的Perl版本（5.18和更高版本）将从核心中删除Pod-Parser，并将Pod-Simple用于所有POD。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: this port (as of 0.4.1) does not compile into a Symbian OS GUI application, but instead it results in a Symbian DLL. The DLL includes a C++ class called CPerlBase, which one can then (derive from and) use to embed Perl into applications, see
trans-unit.target: 注意：此端口（从0.4.1开始）不会编译到Symbian OS GUI应用程序中，而是导致产生Symbian DLL。DLL包含一个称为CPerlBase的C ++类，然后可以（派生自和）将Perl嵌入到应用程序中，请参见

trans-unit.source: NOTE: FATAL warnings should be used with care, particularly FATAL => 'all' .
trans-unit.target: 注意：应谨慎使用致命警告，尤其是 FATAL => 'all' 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: FATAL warnings should be used with care, particularly FATAL => 'all'.
trans-unit.target: 注意：应谨慎使用致命警告，尤其是 FATAL => 'all' 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: For performance reasons, this method caches the input stream at the top of the stack in a local variable. Any attempts by clients to change the stack contents during processing when in the midst executing of this method
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于性能原因，此方法将输入流缓存在堆栈顶部的本地变量中。在执行此方法期间，客户端在处理过程中尝试更改堆栈内容的任何尝试

trans-unit.source: NOTE: For security reasons, we strongly advise use of the hashref-as-final-argument syntax -- specifically, with a setting of the safe element to a true value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于安全原因，我们强烈建议使用hashref-as-final-argument语法-特别是将 safe 元素设置为真实值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: For security reasons, we strongly advise use of the hashref-as-final-argument syntax, specifically with a setting of the safe element to a true value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于安全原因，我们强烈建议使用hashref-as-final-argument语法，特别是将 safe 元素设置为true值。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: In order to make things easier for programmers with experience with the Python or PCRE regex engines the pattern (?P>NAME) may be used instead of (?&NAME).
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了使对Python或PCRE正则表达式引擎有经验的程序员更轻松，可以使用模式 (?P>NAME) 代替 (?&NAME) 。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: In order to make things easier for programmers with experience with the Python or PCRE regex engines the pattern (?P>NAME) may be used instead of (?&NAME).
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了使对Python或PCRE正则表达式引擎有经验的程序员更轻松，可以使用 (?P>NAME) 模式代替 (?&NAME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: In order to make things easier for programmers with experience with the Python or PCRE regex engines, the pattern (?P<NAME>pattern) may be used instead of (?<NAME>pattern); however this form does not support the use of single quotes as a delimiter for the name.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了使对Python或PCRE正则表达式引擎有经验的程序员更轻松，可以使用模式 (?P<NAME>pattern) 代替 (?<NAME>pattern) ; 但是，此格式不支持使用单引号作为名称的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: In order to make things easier for programmers with experience with the Python or PCRE regex engines, the pattern (?P<NAME>pattern) may be used instead of (?<NAME>pattern); however this form does not support the use of single quotes as a delimiter for the name.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了使对Python或PCRE正则表达式引擎有经验的程序员更轻松，可以使用模式 (?P<NAME>pattern) 代替 (?<NAME>pattern) ; 但是，此格式不支持使用单引号作为名称的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: In order to make things easier for programmers with experience with the Python or PCRE regex engines, the pattern (?P=NAME) may be used instead of \k<NAME>.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了使对Python或PCRE正则表达式引擎有经验的程序员更轻松，可以使用模式 (?P=NAME) 代替 \k<NAME> 。
